english.segment1: A screaming man falls to his knees. His broken heart, inflicts the pain. He's withdrawn, no one knows his name. One mistake, now he's lost in shame
english.segment2: Amidst the pain, you're not alone. Though you can't see through the haze. His eyes of love are staring down. And He feels your troubled heart
english.segment3: Yes it's true, that someone cares. Your perfect friend, never leaving you. Strength is gone and you're feeling cold. You will know the truth that He told
english.segment4: Amidst the pain, you're not alone. Though you can't see through the haze. His eyes of love are staring down. And He feels your troubled heart
english.segment5: By Your grace You repair the broken pieces within. Somehow You take a man and make something more out of him
